input.sentences: the old house on the street has a lot of history behind it .
although it looks modern it has been around for some time .
the back side of it has been completely refurnished .
this is a picture of it when it was first constructed .
the original house had fewer modifications than its current state .
output.sentences: The house on the street on lot 13 is for sale.
It is from an older time but is still perfect for the modern day.
The entire house has been regurnished and completely remodeled inside.
This is a picture from back when it was consructed.
Here is what the original house looked like before the modifications.
